name: MoneyMaker Hustle Drop Olive Oversized-Tee
description:
STORY

Wear Success. Speak Wealth.
This sophisticated olive green oversized T-shirt combines premium comfort with a powerful money quote, designed to inspire confidence and ambition in every wearer. Perfect for the youth who value style and financial wisdom.

 DETAILS

✔️ 100% Pure Cotton- Soft, breathable fabric for day-long comfort and ease.
✔️ Oversized Youth Fit- Trendy, relaxed cut tailored for modern, street-style appeal.
✔️ Weight: 240 GSM- Thick, premium cotton for durability and luxury.
✔️ HD Printing.Bold, high-definition printing delivers crisp, vibrant details that resist fading and cracking over time.
✔️ Money Quote Theme- Features an impactful quote about money and success, inspiring wearers to chase their financial dreams with determination and grit.
✔️ Colour- Rich olive green base accented by sharp white and stylized text. 
✔️ Made in India-Crafted with expert care by skilled local artisans.


ARTWORK FEATURES

- The design incorporates motivational money quotes alongside sleek graphic elements, creating a statement piece for those who believe in financial empowerment.
- High quality printing ensures every word and detail stands out with clarity and style.



WASH CARE

- Machine wash inside out with cold water to maintain print quality and fabric softness.
- Use gentle detergents; avoid bleach or harsh chemicals.
- Avoid ironing directly on the print for longevity.


This olive green money quote T-shirt is a perfect combination of thoughtful motivation, premium material, and youthful style, ideal for fashion-forward individuals with an eye on success.

acceptedAnswer.text: Delivery usually takes 3–7 days across India.
Yes, you can return the product within 7 days.
